statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={3.4} , \displaystyle{b}={4.7}, \displaystyle{c}={6.5}, and \displaystyle{d}={8.8}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={6.3}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
